application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Lower ground floor infill extension set back from outrigger rear elevation, with associated rear glazed doors and rear lightwell; installation of new staircase to rear garden, new glazed panelled door to front lightwell vault access; creation of upper ground floor rear side glazed infill extension set back from outrigger facade and associated rear glazed doors with reconstructed garden stairs; installation of French doors to rear of first floor with new terrace beyond, set back from outrigger rear elevation with metal railings to match existing; refurbished second floor terrace with raised parapet height to match neighbouring parapet at No.49 with metal railings to match existing and addition of glazed doors; replacement of single glazed external windows throughout with double glazed units; replacement of upper and lower ground front extrance doors; addition of opening rooflight to top of mansard roof; construction of garden room to rear garden with flat roof and rooflight, metal framed glazed sliding doors and window and internal reconfigurations throughout
